proto_language.name: Proto-Language
proto_language.description: Basic communication through gestures, simple vocalizations, and environmental sounds

basic_language.name: Basic Language
basic_language.description: Consistent vocabulary with simple grammar, allowing basic needs and observations to be communicated

complex_language.name: Complex Language
complex_language.description: Expanded vocabulary with more complex grammar, allowing abstract concepts and detailed instructions

symbolic_representation.name: Symbolic Representation
symbolic_representation.description: Development of pictographs and symbols to represent language visually

writing_system.name: Writing System
writing_system.description: Formalized writing system with consistent rules for recording language

standardized_language.name: Standardized Language
standardized_language.description: Formalized grammar, spelling, and vocabulary with educational systems for transmission

environmental.terrain_diversity: Increases specialized vocabulary for terrain features
environmental.climate_variability: Develops vocabulary for weather patterns and seasonal changes
environmental.isolation: Promotes unique language development but limits external influences

social.population_size: Larger populations develop more complex language systems
social.social_complexity: More social roles lead to specialized terminology
social.external_contact: Trade and diplomacy introduce loan words and new concepts
social.conflict: Warfare develops strategic communication and coded language

technological.tool_complexity: Requires precise terminology for creation and use
technological.knowledge_accumulation: Requires more abstract terms and specialized vocabulary
technological.information_storage: Writing systems evolve to meet record-keeping needs
technological.communication_technology: Changes how language is transmitted and preserved

cultural.identity_formation: Creates in-group terminology and cultural markers

effects.innovation_source: New words and expressions enter main language
